languages.text: {n}От едкого смеха ксеноса бегут мурашки.{/n} "Позволь другим пачкать руки. Один маяк — и на затронутые ульи обрушится рейд моих родичей. Возможно, зацепят кого-то... но когда они закончат — живых в гнездах твоих врагов не останется".

{n}Marazhai's caustic laugh sends shivers down your spine.{/n} "Let others sully their hands. Just one beacon — and my kinsmen will descend upon the affected hives. Perhaps they will cause some additional casualties here and there... but, have no doubt, none of your enemies will survive, even hiding in their little nests."
languages.original_text: {n}От едкого смеха ксеноса бегут мурашки.{/n} "Позволь другим пачкать руки. Один маяк — и на затронутые ульи обрушится рейд моих родичей. Возможно, зацепят кого-то... но когда они закончат — живых в гнездах твоих врагов не останется".

traits.locale_text: {n}The caustic laugh of the xenos sends the shivers down your spine.{/n} "Let the others sully their hands. One beacon — and a raid of my kinsmen will crash down on the affected hives. Perhaps they may cause some casualties here and there... but there will be no survivors in the eyries of your enemies after they are done."

{n}The caustic laugh of the xenos sends the shivers down your spine.{/n} "Let the others sully their hands. One beacon — and a raid of my kinsmen will crash down on the affected hives. Perhaps they may cause some casualties here and there... but there will be no survivors in the eyries of your enemies after they are done."

Perhaps they will cause some additional casualties here and there... but, have no doubt, none of your enemies will survive, even hiding in their little nests."

Perhaps they will cause some additional casualties here and there... but, have no doubt, none of your enemies will survive, even hiding in their little nests."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋刻薄的笑声让你脊背发冷。{/n}“就让别人来干这些脏活吧。只要一个信标，我的族人就会扑向受影响的巢都。或许他们会在那些地方造成一些额外伤亡……但毫无疑问，你的敌人一个都活不下来，就算他们躲进自己的小巢里也无济于事。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's caustic laugh sends shivers down your spine.{/n} "Let others sully their hands. Just one beacon — and my kinsmen will descend upon the affected hives. Perhaps they will cause some additional casualties here and there... but, have no doubt, none of your enemies will survive, even hiding in their little nests."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋刻薄的笑声让你脊背发冷。{/n}“就让别人来干这些脏活吧。只要一个信标，我的族人就会扑向受影响的巢都。或许他们会在那些地方造成一些额外伤亡……但毫无疑问，你的敌人一个都活不下来，就算他们躲进自己的小巢里也无济于事。”
{n}玛拉斋刻薄的笑声让你脊背发冷。{/n}“就让别人来干这些脏活吧。只要一个信标，我的族人就会扑向受影响的巢都。或许他们会在那些地方造成一些额外伤亡……但毫无疑问，你的敌人一个都活不下来，就算他们躲进自己的小巢里也无济于事。”

languages.text: {n}La risa sarcástica de Marazhai te produce escalofríos.{/n} «Deja que otros se manchen las manos. Una sola baliza y mis parientes caerán sobre las colmenas afectadas. Tal vez causen algunas bajas adicionales aquí y allá... pero que no te quepa duda: ninguno de tus enemigos sobrevivirá, ni siquiera escondiéndose en sus pequeños nidos».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's caustic laugh sends shivers down your spine.{/n} "Let others sully their hands. Just one beacon — and my kinsmen will descend upon the affected hives. Perhaps they will cause some additional casualties here and there... but, have no doubt, none of your enemies will survive, even hiding in their little nests."

traits.locale_text: {n}La risa sarcástica de Marazhai te produce escalofríos.{/n} «Deja que otros se manchen las manos. Una sola baliza y mis parientes caerán sobre las colmenas afectadas. Tal vez causen algunas bajas adicionales aquí y allá... pero que no te quepa duda: ninguno de tus enemigos sobrevivirá, ni siquiera escondiéndose en sus pequeños nidos».

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの苛烈な笑い声に背筋が凍る。{/n}「他の者に手を汚させるとしよう。たった1つのビーコンで...私の親族が、影響を受けたハイヴに激突する。もしかしたら、あちこちで死傷者が出るかもしれない...だが、小さな巣穴に隠れていようとも、敵は間違いなく誰一人生き残れないだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's caustic laugh sends shivers down your spine.{/n} "Let others sully their hands. Just one beacon — and my kinsmen will descend upon the affected hives. Perhaps they will cause some additional casualties here and there... but, have no doubt, none of your enemies will survive, even hiding in their little nests."

traits.locale_text: {n}ゼノの苛烈な笑い声に背筋が凍る。{/n}「他の者に手を汚させるとしよう。たった1つのビーコンで...私の親族が、影響を受けたハイヴに激突する。もしかしたら、あちこちで死傷者が出るかもしれない...だが、小さな巣穴に隠れていようとも、敵は間違いなく誰一人生き残れないだろう」
{n}ゼノの苛烈な笑い声に背筋が凍る。{/n}「他の者に手を汚させるとしよう。たった1つのビーコンで...私の親族が、影響を受けたハイヴに激突する。もしかしたら、あちこちで死傷者が出るかもしれない...だが、小さな巣穴に隠れていようとも、敵は間違いなく誰一人生き残れないだろう」

languages.text: {n}Le rire acerbe de Marazhai vous fait frissonner.{/n} « Laissons d'autres se salir les mains. Il nous suffit d'activer une balise pour que les miens frappent les ruches affectées. Bien sûr, il risque d'y avoir des dommages collatéraux ici et là... mais aucun ennemi n'y survivra, je vous le garantis. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's caustic laugh sends shivers down your spine.{/n} "Let others sully their hands. Just one beacon — and my kinsmen will descend upon the affected hives. Perhaps they will cause some additional casualties here and there... but, have no doubt, none of your enemies will survive, even hiding in their little nests."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le rire acerbe de Marazhai vous fait frissonner.{/n} « Laissons d'autres se salir les mains. Il nous suffit d'activer une balise pour que les miens frappent les ruches affectées. Bien sûr, il risque d'y avoir des dommages collatéraux ici et là... mais aucun ennemi n'y survivra, je vous le garantis. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhais beißendes Lachen lässt dich erschaudern.{/n} "Sollen andere sich die Hände schmutzig machen. Ein Zeichen genügt ... und meine Leute fallen über die betroffenen Makropolen her. Gut, es wird vielleicht hier und da ein paar zusätzliche Opfer geben ... aber keiner Eurer Feinde wird überleben, selbst wenn sie sich in ihren kleinen Nestern verstecken."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's caustic laugh sends shivers down your spine.{/n} "Let others sully their hands. Just one beacon — and my kinsmen will descend upon the affected hives. Perhaps they will cause some additional casualties here and there... but, have no doubt, none of your enemies will survive, even hiding in their little nests."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais beißendes Lachen lässt dich erschaudern.{/n} "Sollen andere sich die Hände schmutzig machen. Ein Zeichen genügt ... und meine Leute fallen über die betroffenen Makropolen her. Gut, es wird vielleicht hier und da ein paar zusätzliche Opfer geben ... aber keiner Eurer Feinde wird überleben, selbst wenn sie sich in ihren kleinen Nestern verstecken."

{n}Das beißende Lachen des Xenos jagt dir einen Schauer den Rücken hinunter.{/n} "Sollen andere sich die Hände schmutzig machen. Ein Wort reicht — und mein Volk wird über die betroffenen Makropolen herfallen. Gut, es wird vielleicht hier und da ein paar zusätzliche Opfer geben ... aber keiner Eurer Feinde wird überleben, selbst wenn sie sich in ihren kleinen Nestern verstecken."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın iğneleyici kahkahası, tüylerini diken diken ediyor.{/n} "Bırak da başkaları ellerini kirletsin. Tek bir işaret ışığı yeter. Soydaşlarım, etkilenen kovanların üzerine çöker. Belki sağda solda fazladan zayiat olur ama... Kuşkun olmasın, minik yuvalarında saklansalar bile düşmanlarından hiçbiri sağ çıkmayacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's caustic laugh sends shivers down your spine.{/n} "Let others sully their hands. Just one beacon — and my kinsmen will descend upon the affected hives. Perhaps they will cause some additional casualties here and there... but, have no doubt, none of your enemies will survive, even hiding in their little nests."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın iğneleyici kahkahası, tüylerini diken diken ediyor.{/n} "Bırak da başkaları ellerini kirletsin. Tek bir işaret ışığı yeter. Soydaşlarım, etkilenen kovanların üzerine çöker. Belki sağda solda fazladan zayiat olur ama... Kuşkun olmasın, minik yuvalarında saklansalar bile düşmanlarından hiçbiri sağ çıkmayacak."
